name: part_004
file: tmp_【#2ETAnniv】 Zeta's Mini 3D Party!【Vestia Zeta ⧸ Hololive ID】 [YOD6oVkRp9E]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Zeta talks to the audience about the next song and introduces her companion, Bazo.
Zeta performs "Suki ni Naccha Dame na Hito".
scenes.song_name: Suki ni Naccha Dame na Hito

scenes.description: Zeta greets the audience after her performance.

subtitles.original: Losers. Just kidding.
subtitles.english: Losers. Just kidding.

subtitles.original: Um, so next song, so next song is something, something you guys might really like.
subtitles.english: Um, so next song, so next song is something, something you guys might really like.

subtitles.original: Hehehe. What do you think it is?
subtitles.english: Hehehe. What do you think it is?

subtitles.original: I wanted something really like groovy, really like slow,
subtitles.english: I wanted something really like groovy, really like slow,

subtitles.original: cause lately I've been really into like, like sweet but like slow songs, you know?
subtitles.english: cause lately I've been really into like, like sweet but like slow songs, you know?

subtitles.original: Um... what if I bring a friend with me?
subtitles.english: Um... what if I bring a friend with me?

subtitles.original: What do you guys think? Should I bring...
subtitles.english: What do you guys think? Should I bring...

subtitles.original: ...should I bring a friend with me? (Struggling sounds) Hahaha!
subtitles.english: ...should I bring a friend with me? (Struggling sounds) Hahaha!

subtitles.original: I'm going to bring him along as well.
subtitles.english: I'm going to bring him along as well.

subtitles.original: バゾのこと好き？
subtitles.english: Do you like Bazo?

subtitles.original: バゾ好き？
subtitles.english: Do you like Bazo?

subtitles.original: バゾ好き？ん？
subtitles.english: Do you like Bazo? Hmm?

subtitles.original: 好きはダメだよ。
subtitles.english: You can't like him.

subtitles.original: You can't like Bazo. Bazo's mine.
subtitles.english: You can't like Bazo. Bazo's mine.

subtitles.original: He's my slave forever. You can't like him.
subtitles.english: He's my slave forever. You can't like him.

subtitles.original: Well, and on that note,
subtitles.english: Well, and on that note,

subtitles.original: I have a song related to a person or someone that you can't like, okay?
subtitles.english: I have a song related to a person or someone that you can't like, okay?

subtitles.original: So let's go!
subtitles.english: So let's go!

subtitles.original: Next song!
subtitles.english: Next song!

subtitles.original: 好きになっちゃダメな人
subtitles.english: The person you shouldn't fall in love with

subtitles.original: 負けじゃん 勝てるわけないじゃん
subtitles.english: I've lost already, haven't I? There's no way I can win

subtitles.original: 最初から分かってた
subtitles.english: I knew it from the start

subtitles.original: あなたは あなたは
subtitles.english: That you are, you are

subtitles.original: 好きになっちゃダメな人
subtitles.english: The person you shouldn't fall in love with

subtitles.original: あなたの「好き」ってどんな「好き」？
subtitles.english: What kind of 'like' is your 'like'?

subtitles.original: 多分私と違う「好き」
subtitles.english: It's probably a different 'like' from mine

subtitles.original: 「可愛い」だなんて言葉でごまかさないで
subtitles.english: Don't try to gloss it over with words like 'cute'

subtitles.original: 大事にされてること、は痛いほど分かるけれど
subtitles.english: I know you treasure me, so much it hurts

subtitles.original: 何かが足りない 違う そうじゃない
subtitles.english: Something's missing, it's different, that's not it

subtitles.original: 気持ちが死にたい mm-mm-mm
subtitles.english: My feelings want to die, mm-mm-mm

subtitles.original: 私が大きくなったよ
subtitles.english: I've grown up, you know

subtitles.original: 背伸びしたら届きそうな
subtitles.english: If I stretch on my tiptoes, I could almost reach

subtitles.original: あなたの唇
subtitles.english: Your lips

subtitles.original: もう子供扱いしないでよ
subtitles.english: Stop treating me like a child already

subtitles.original: ほらまた頭くしゃって
subtitles.english: See, you're ruffling my hair again

subtitles.original: くしゃってする
subtitles.english: Ruffling it like that

subtitles.original: 好きになっちゃダメな人
subtitles.english: The person you shouldn't fall in love with

subtitles.original: 負けじゃん 勝てるわけないじゃん
subtitles.english: I've lost already, haven't I? There's no way I can win

subtitles.original: そのずるい笑顔に 飲み込まれてゆく
subtitles.english: I'm being swallowed up by that unfair smile of yours

subtitles.english: The person you shouldn't fall in love with

subtitles.original: こんなのってないじゃん
subtitles.english: This is so unfair, isn't it?

subtitles.english: The times to realize my feelings

subtitles.original: たくさんあったはずなのに
subtitles.english: There must have been so many of them

subtitles.original: 私可愛くないほど 素直じゃない
subtitles.english: I'm not honest enough to be cute

subtitles.original: このまま消えたい mm-mm-mm
subtitles.english: I just want to disappear like this, mm-mm-mm

subtitles.english: Every time my feelings swell up

subtitles.english: It's frustrating that they'll be found out

subtitles.original: 隠した横顔
subtitles.english: So I hide my profile

subtitles.original: 好きでいさせて 一人なの？
subtitles.english: Let me keep loving you, am I all alone?

subtitles.original: そうだと知ってしまって 涙が出る
subtitles.english: Knowing that's the case makes the tears fall

subtitles.english: There's no way it'll come true
